Method Detail

ping

public PingResponse ping(java.lang.String url)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Pings a URL to query its status. The method defaults to a 30 second timeout.

Parameters:
url - - the URL String to ping.
Returns:
PingResponse representing either OKAY, ERROR or TIMEOUT.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

ping

public PingResponse ping(java.lang.String url,
                         int timeout)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Pings a URL to query its status. The method accepts a timeout interval specified in seconds.

Parameters:
url - - the URL String to ping.
timeout - - the timeout interval specified in seconds.
Returns:
PingResponse representing either OKAY, ERROR or TIMEOUT.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
